# SignInWithAppleButton.Style

**Structure**

The structure that defines styles that you use to control the button’s appearance.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Style
```

## Styles

- **black**: The constant that defines a black button.
- **white**: The constant that defines a white button.
- **whiteOutline**: The constant that defines a white-outlined button.

## Creating a button

- **init(_:onRequest:onCompletion:)**: Creates a Sign in with Apple button.
- **SignInWithAppleButton.Label**: The label that appears on the button.

items.description: The constant that defines a black button.
items.name: black

items.description: The constant that defines a white button.
items.name: white

items.description: The constant that defines a white-outlined button.
items.name: whiteOutline
